name: Drone Simulator (itch) (Sorata)
description:
Drone Simulator allows you to hone your flying skills in acro-mode, the elaborated maps allow you to perform any maneuvers of varying complexity and train piloting skills, the well-developed physics simulates the flight in reality as accurately as possible.

Drone Simulator is the ultimate real life drone simulator. You can fly and turn with great accuracy to drones because of the physics engine built into city drone flight simulator features. With your drone you can drive on the beach, in the city, in the mountains, at the airport, and even in space. With tons of unlock-able drones and features you can be the ultimate drone flyer. Learn to maneuver around buildings and enjoy the thrill of the simulator. Other Simulators can't compete with the graphics of Drone simulator.

Drone Simulator Features:
- 13 Maps
- No Ads
- No Time Limit
- No Wifi Needed
